abbreviation for Cabinet Office Briefing Rooms: a meeting room or rooms where an emergency committee (= official group) of the British government meets for urgent discussions, or the committee itself: He held talks with security chiefs in the Parliament's emergency briefing room, COBRA, about whether to close the subway network. Chairing the emergency Cobra committee, the Health Secretary said: "It's crucial we prepare for things getting worse." Ministers broke off their holidays to hold an emergency Cobra meeting to discuss the outbreak.
More examplesFewer examplesBanning football matches was discussed by the Cobra emergency response committee.The COBRA meeting was told that terrorists had developed the capacity to assemble the bombs. Ministers will take part in mock emergency Cobra meetings and local emergency services will test their response to a potential disaster.
